summary: Iteration 44 - Testing recent changes: YarnGPT voices, Interest Matrix, Sound Themes, Notifications endpoints, IndentationError fix. Backend 11/11 tests passed. Frontend verified via Playwright.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: /api/voices returns YarnGPT voices (idera, emma, zainab, osagie, wura) - NOT old OpenAI voices
PASS: /api/settings/{user_id} correctly stores and retrieves 'interests' array and 'sound_theme' string
PASS: /api/briefing/latest returns 200 or 404 (no server crash - IndentationError fixed)
PASS: /api/news returns news items with proper structure
PASS: Voice Studio page (/voices) displays YarnGPT voice names (Idera, Emma, Zainab, Osagie, Wura) with correct language labels (Yoruba, English, Hausa, Igbo, Pidgin)
PASS: All 5 voice cards have data-testid='voice-card-{id}' attributes
PASS: Settings page (/settings) has INTEREST_MATRIX section with 8 clickable category buttons (politics, economy, tech, sports, health, general, culture, security)
PASS: Each interest button has data-testid='interest-{id}' for testing
PASS: Interest toggle saves to backend and shows 'INTERESTS_UPDATED' notification
PASS: System Settings page (/system) has BROADCAST_THEMES section with 5+ sound theme cards
PASS: Sound theme cards have data-testid='theme-{id}' attributes
PASS: Dashboard loads with news feed (FEATURED_TRANSMISSION + SYNTHESIZED_NEWS_STREAMS)
PASS: Audio player bar visible at bottom with 00:00 timestamp and play controls

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all requested UI features verified via Playwright)

test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' on landing page. Close SKIP_TOUR modal when it appears.
seed_data_creation: Created test settings for user 'test-iter44-*' with interests and sound_theme
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 features requested have been tested and verified. Backend endpoints all working correctly. YarnGPT voices properly returned from /api/voices (no old OpenAI voices). Interest Matrix has 8 category buttons on Settings page. Sound Themes section visible on System Settings page. Tour guide modal auto-appears on first visit - use SKIP_TOUR to dismiss. Protected routes require guest session via Oya,Play button.

voices_yarngpt.notes: Returns 5 YarnGPT voices: idera (Yoruba), emma (English), zainab (Hausa), osagie (Igbo), wura (Pidgin). No old OpenAI voices.

sound_themes.notes: Returns 5+ themes including narvo_classic, afrobeats, bbc_world, pidgin_cool, minimal_zen

notification_digest.notes: GET /api/notifications/digest returns NARVO DAILY DIGEST with top_stories

settings_interests.notes: interests array stored and retrieved correctly via POST /api/settings/{user_id}

settings_sound_theme.notes: sound_theme string stored and retrieved correctly

voice_studio_ui.notes: 5 voice cards visible: Idera, Emma, Zainab, Osagie, Wura with correct language labels

settings_interest_matrix_ui.notes: 8 interest category buttons visible: politics, economy, tech, sports, health, general, culture, security

system_themes_ui.notes: BROADCAST_THEMES section visible with sound theme cards

dashboard_news_feed.notes: Dashboard loads with FEATURED_TRANSMISSION and SYNTHESIZED_NEWS_STREAMS sections
